snippet: Timur Bekbulatov, 29, and Sergey Khoroshev, 47, were thrown from a water scooter in Lower New York Bay on Saturday night but swam to nearby islands and were found the next morning.
abstract: Timur Bekbulatov and Sergey Khoroshev are thrown from a jet ski in Lower New York Bay off Staten Island; New York City Fire and Police Departments rescue the men from tiny islands after all-night ordeal.
lead_paragraph: Timur Bekbulatov, 29, and Sergey Khoroshev, 47, were thrown from a water scooter in Lower New York Bay on Saturday night but swam to nearby islands and were found the next morning.

headline.main: Two Men Are Rescued After Mishap in Lower Bay
headline.print_headline: Two Jet Skiers Are Rescued After Mishap in Lower Bay
